name: Farm and Fight
description:
My friend wanted to do a game in a day challenge, and so I decided to do one with him. You can also playmy other game that I made in a day. This one is a farming sim and is very clunky and terribly unbalanced. Did I mention it was made in a day?

I'm still working on my main project which (if you haven't guessed) is being made in more than one day and will feature art by the very kind Michael Squirrel, the creator of Sojourner and Teragard - which I highly recommend you check out.

Anyway, yeah, this game is free so if you want to try it out I see no reason not to. *shrug*
